p: The LDPCs, including Gambia, Sudan, and Nepal, have particularly appealed to the UNFCCC and the World Bank to ensure funding through the Green Climate Fund (GCF), the Least Developed Countries Fund (LDCF), the Special Climate Change Fund (SCCF), Climate Investment Funds (CIFs), the EU Global Climate Change Alliance Programme, the Scaling up Renewable Energy in Low Income Countries Programme (SREP), and more. They need funding from different actors (N5.1) for different sectors (5.3) at different scales (N5.2).
